DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether CenteringPregnancy group prenatal care improve preterm birth rate birth outcome , maternal psychosocial behavioral outcome , decrease racial difference select birth outcome among African American White woman , compare individual prenatal care .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial compare biomedical , behavioral psychosocial outcome race among pregnant woman participate CenteringPregnancy group prenatal care , woman traditional individual prenatal care investigate whether improve woman 's stress , activation engagement explain potential benefit CenteringPregnancy outcomes health disparity . The trial conduct large prenatal care center South Carolina . Eligible White Black woman recruit 20 week gestational age low risk pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman age 1445 year 2 . Entry prenatal care 20 6/7 week gestational age ( define attendance intake screen visit ) . Patients must randomize 23 6/7 week gestational age . 1 . Medical complication pregnancy would preclude prenatal care provision nurse practitioner participation group care Pregestational diabetes , Severe chronic hypertension require medication , Morbid Obesity BMI > 45 Renal disease baseline proteinuria > 1g/24 hour Any disease require chronic immunosuppression ( SLE , solid organ transplant ) Active pulmonary tuberculosis Sickle cell anemia Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infection Other medical condition would exclude woman group care discretion PI 2 . Pregnancy complication would preclude prenatal care provision nurse practitioner participation group care Multiple gestation Lethal fetal anomaly Other pregnancy complication would exclude woman group care discretion PI 3 . Social behavioral complication pregnancy would preclude prenatal care provision nurse practitioner participation group care Current incarceration Severe psychiatric illness
